title: Why is my new phone constantly crashing all of a sudden?
content:
I have several apps that work the first time, but once closed they will crash upon opening again. Only way to fix is to uninstall or clear all storage and cache for the app.

To use any app I effectively have to install it for the first time and login for the first time. Specifically for my financial apps this is getting quite tiresome. 

Why did this just start happening?
